node.text: Why did he do that? That small old man knocked me down with a beer bottle and now I stink of alcohol.
node.name: Ray

node.text: I'm sure he went to that bar to drink another one, better go and talk to him. I need to know where I ended up.
node.name: Ray

node.text: Heeyyy Boy!!
node.name: Crazy Man

node.text: Are.... Are you talking to me?
node.name: Ray

node.text: Of course, you see anyone else around here besides the giant green monster? He doesn't talk too much.
node.name: Crazy Man

dialogue.option: 1: Sorry, I'm out, I can't deal with this, I'll get going.
2: What do you want, I don't have money on me right now.

node.text: Wait don't run away from me. There's, there's lava all over the place.
node.name: Crazy Man

node.text: Wait when did all this lava spread? It was you right? It has to be you, I'll never forgive you NEVER (dies dramatically).
node.name: Crazy Man

node.text: That was unexpected, I better go inside and see if the old man is there.
node.name: Ray

node.text: No, I don't want your money, I'm here to tell you a secret, I buried the biggest treasure in this asteroid but I don't remember where I left it.
node.name: Crazy Man

node.text: So you want me to help you look for it? I'm not a charity volunteer, you know.
node.name: Ray

node.text: What? No, nonono, it's my treasure, only mine, it helps with the voices, do you understand? No one will ever find my treasure, it's mine!!
node.name: Crazy Man

node.text: Hey, hey I found it! Oh well, one last trip won't hurt me.
node.name: Crazy Man

node.text: All right, nice, he just... never mind, we're not seeing him again.
node.name: Ray

node.text: Hey Boy, do you have a second?
node.name: Barman

dialogue.option: 2: Sure, what's up friendly looking stranger?

node.text: Not really, listen I have a job for you.
node.name: Barman

node.text: Well well, look who's trying to be funny.
node.name: Barman

node.text: What would you tell me if I said i'll pay you with some items for doing some chores?
node.name: Barman

node.text: Excellent, you can begin as soon as you like, I always have people that would be better outside. You're old enough right.
node.name: Barman

node.text: Of course I'm old enough, you're the one making me fight big drunk people here.
node.name: Ray

node.text: Good point.
node.name: Barman

node.text: Just the average go kill someone or gather great ingredients
node.name: Barman

node.text: Yeah why not.
node.name: Ray

node.text: Whenever you're ready to work, talk with me, I'll tell you who to take out.
node.name: Barman

node.text: I better go find that old man, he may leave without me if I don't do so and I would be doomed by then.
node.name: Ray

node.text: What, what do you want? I think i told your friends earlier that i'm not interested in knowing the truth behind the creation of the universe.
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: Now get away or suffer my legendary wrath!
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: Look who woke up after a free trip here, hahahaha you deadhead.
node.name: Old Captain

node.text: It was you crashing into me in the middle of nowhere in the first place you crazy old man. How do you expect me to return to my fancy ship?
node.name: Ray

node.text: Look, you deadhead, you were the one floating in the middle and my ship's assisted direction broke yesterday, that's why i'm here.
node.name: Old Captain

node.text: I told you i have a name, I'm Ray.
node.name: Ray

node.text: Well then Ray, seems like you're stuck with me now, let's listen to my drunk friend here, we could be rich in no time, i'll tell you the details later.
node.name: Old Captain

node.text: Long, long time ago, I was one a legendary captain, everyone feared me and my 500 man army, we were unstoppable.
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: Until our most veteran pilot drove the ship too close to a black hole, he took the only life-saving shuttle, leaving the ship and his comrades behind.
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: How many times do I have to tell you, the ship's assisted direction wasn't working as it should.
node.name: Old Captain

node.text: When I found out about my ship I swore that I'd never have another tripulation.
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: I buried all my gear in different planets, for some reason.
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: But that ends today, I need you to recover my treasures, we will be feared again!
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: I knew I shouldn't have gotten out of my bed todayâ€¦
node.name: Ray

node.text: You can't be serious, you know how much power you'd get on yourself if we recovered his treasures? Imagine all the ladies you'll have on your feet.
node.name: Old Captain

node.text: Count me in partner, I will establish your galaxy wide legend and in the meantime I can become awfully rich too.
node.name: Ray

node.text: Hey have you heard, the kid's saying he will do it!
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: Okay, this is the map for the first item, my legendary sword buried in this dungeon, you may encounter some monsters there.
node.name: Legendary Pirate

node.text: I better go find that old man, he may leave without me and I don't want to stay here for eternity.
node.name: Ray

node.text: Those drunk bastards are tearing apart this place, ready for the job Ray?
node.name: Barman

dialogue.option: 1: No, i still have to do something else.

node.text: Oh really? Then someone else will have to drink this beer I prepared for you.
node.name: Barman

node.text: Thank you, take these super awesome weapons, it's your turn to earn your wages!.
node.name: Barman

node.text: Should I even touch it?
node.name: Ray

node.text: Hey, before you go on to battle do you mind doing me a favor?
node.name: Barman

dialogue.option: 1: No, i still have to do something else.

node.text: Well okay, remember about our the deal.
node.name: Barman

node.text: Perfect, I need you to gather the raw ingredients for my newest sauce, here is a list of what I need.
node.name: Barman
